page.title: 17BENTHAM NEWS
page.content: The following events were reported in the local press (W/E 19-7-85). The Primary School Summer Fair raised Â£400 for school funds on Saturday. There had been maypole dancing (a revival of an old custom), stalls, refreshments and the first performance by Bentham Concert Band. The same school had held it's Sports on the 16th. Blue Team had won with Red second and Yellow third. Also on 13th had been the local Rose Show, they reported disappointing results because of the poor weather. Angus's also had their open day. Over 600 visitors watched a display of fire fighting equipment and took part in a conducted tour of the factory. In addition reports were provided about St Margaret's Patronal Festival and an exciting week for the Bentham Netball Team.
